markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impossible](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1868)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 33 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rune makes a weapon capable of impossible offense and defense. The etched weapon is immune to [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) and similar effects that could [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) its magic. If it's a ranged weapon or [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon, its range increment is doubled.

<document level="2" id="action-1566" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Impossible
